participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

aeq_section_q01.Description: Alcohol helps a person relax, feel happy, feel less tense, and can keep a person's mind off of mistakes at school or work. | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q02.Description: Alcohol can help how well a person gets along with others (makes people want to have fun together). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q03.Description: Alcohol can hurt how well a person gets along with others (makes people mean to others). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q04.Description: Alcohol helps people think better and helps coordination (people understand things better; can do things better). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q05.Description: Alcohol hurts how people think and it hurts their coordination (run into things, act silly, have a hangover). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q06.Description: Alcohol makes a person feel stronger and more powerful (easier to fight, speak in front of others, stand up to others). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

aeq_section_q07.Description: Alcohol can make people more careless or do things that could get them into trouble (do things they feel bad about; do things they regret). | 1 = Disagree Strongly; 2 = Disagree Somewhat; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree Somewhat; 5 = Agree Strongly / tlfb_alc_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_alc_c_l   == '1'

subj_resp_alc_1a_l.Description: The first 5 times you ever drank: how many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel different? (where you could feel an effect) DO NOT count sips taken as a child. | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_2a_l.Description: The first 5 times you ever drank: How many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel a bit dizzy or to begin to slur your speech? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_3a_l.Description: The first 5 times you ever drank: How many drinks did it take for you to begin stumbling, or walking in an uncoordinated manner? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_4a_l.Description: The first 5 times you ever drank: How many drinks did it take you to pass out, or fall asleep when you did not want to? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_1b_l.Description: Recent 6 months (Drinking at least once a month for 3 consecutive months): How many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel different? (where you could feel an effect) | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_2b_l.Description: Recent 6 months (Drinking at least once a month for 3 consecutive months): How many times did it take for you to begin to feel a bit dizzy or to begin to slur your speech? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_3b_l.Description: Recent 6 months (Drinking at least once a month for 3 consecutive months): How many drinks did it take for you to begin stumbling, or walking in an uncoordinated manner? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_4b_l.Description: Recent 6 months (Drinking at least once a month for 3 consecutive months): How many drinks did it take for you to pass out, or fall asleep when you did not want to? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_1c_l.Description: Period of heaviest drinking: How many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel different? (where you could feel an effect) | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_2c_l.Description: Period of heaviest drinking: How many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel dizzy or to begin to slur your speech? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_3c_l.Description: Period of heaviest drinking: How many drinks did it take for you to begin stumbling, or walking in an uncoordinated manner? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

subj_resp_alc_4c_l.Description: Period of heaviest drinking: How many drinks did it take for you to pass out, or to fall asleep when you did not want to? | If never, enter "0" / tlfb_alc_use_l   == '1' &&  tlfb_alc_use_c_l   == '0'

hangover1_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: felt extremely thirsty or dehydrated. | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover2_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: felt more tired than usual | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover3_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: experienced a headache | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover4_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: felt very nauseous | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover5_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: vomited | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover6_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: felt very weak | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover7_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: had difficulty concentrating | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover8_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: more sensitive to light and sound than usual | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover9_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: sweated more than usual | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover10_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: had a lot of trouble sleeping | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover11_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: was anxious | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover12_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: felt depressed | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover13_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: experienced trembling or shaking | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

hangover14_l.Description: In the past 6 months, what percentage of drinking occasions were followed the next morning by: forgot what happened the night before or "blacked out" | 0 = (0%)Never; 1 = (25%)Occasionally; 2 = (50%)About half the time; 3 = (75%)Most of the time; 4 = (100%)Every time / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q01_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: not able to do your homework or study for a test. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q02_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: got into fights with other people (friends, relatives, strangers). | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q03_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: missed out on other things because you spent too much money on alcohol. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q04_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: went to work or school high or drunk. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q05_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: caused shame or embarrassment to someone. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q06_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: neglected your responsibilities. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section1_q07_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: friends or relatives avoided you. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q08_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: felt that you needed more alcohol than you used to in order to get the same effect. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q09_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: tried to control your drinking (tried to drink only at certain times of the day or in certain places, that is, tried to change your pattern of drinking). | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q10_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: had withdrawal symptoms. That is, you felt sick because you stopped or cut down on drinking. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q11_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: noticed a change in your personality. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q12_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: felt that you had a problem with alcohol. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q13_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: missed a day (or part of a day) of school or work. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section2_q14_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: suddenly found yourself in a place that you could not remember getting to. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section3_q15_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: passed out or fainted suddenly. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section3_q16_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: kept drinking when you promised yourself not to. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section3_q17_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: felt physically or psychologically dependent on alcohol. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

rapi_section3_q18_l.Description: Please indicate how many times each has happened to you within the past 6 months while you were drinking or as a result of your alcohol use: was told by friend, neighbor or relative to stop or cut down drinking. | 0 = 0; 1 = 1-2; 2 = 3-5; 3 = 5+ / xskipout_alc_l   == '1'

su_alc_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'
